name: UpRoot (itch) (Well Done Games)
description:
Root your way up a mysterious tree dungeon!

UpRoot is a platformer with an interesting jump mechanic where you have to climb up and don't fall down! Reminiscent of Jump King and that one dude from Super Mario Odyssey.

This is a game jam game made at the Global Game Jam 2023 at Uni Bayreuth.

Controls

Keyboard: WAD / ←⬆→ / Space 

Gamepad: Left Stick / DPAD / A

You'll have to find out the function of these buttons yourself!

Menu: ESC or Start Button

Credits

UpRoot was made by the team at Well Done Games.

Alexander Schmidt (Programming, Design), Andreas Burkhardtsmaier (Art, Design, Music), Michael Leibner (Art, UI), Sebastian Raabe (Level Design, Coffee).

The main tileset ist a modified version of Cavernas by Adam Saltsman.
